title: Rek'Sai Bug report/Glitch!
body:
Hello,

I don't know if anyone else has noticed these bugs, but they are becoming increasingly more problematic the more i play. I've been playing a lot of rek'sai lately and the two lane/game losing issues I encounter are:

When burrowed, if silenced or stunned, rek'sai will be unable to unburrow, and even sometimes unable to move even once the CC has worn off. The worst examples are when Garen's Q silences me, or a riven or jax stun (i play a lot of rek top), so for instance i might spam click to attack him which would unburrow me once the silence wore off right? Wrong, instead Rek'sai refuses to unburrow, and even worse, wont move at all for another 2 or so seconds, basically giving a bunch for free harrass for them, and losing me any hope of a trade back.

The second issue is in relation to the tunnels. If you place Tunnel A > B ending where tunnel C>D starts, and try to use them fluidly/ in rapid succession to gap close or escape a large distance, upon exiting point B and trying to enter point C, tunnel C>D will close up without rek'sai travelling through it. Effectively killing the awesome escapes I had set up minutes in advance.

I'm not sure if anyone else has noticed this, but i hope this reaches a place where it might be looked at.

Cheers,
Saturn

replies.body:
Just logged in to bump this thread. I've been playing Rek'Sai for a while now and those bugs just keep annoying me all the time. I mean, those are actually hidden nerfs on her that make her feel weakened.

Plz fix {{champion:421}} Rito !
I've experienced the same sorts of issues. Even when I'm unburrowed, if I've been cc'd it seems to effect me well beyond the cc. Often times I find myself unable to cast my E because of this.

Jesus Christ, this thread is almost a year old and this bug hasn't been addressed yet? She's become unplayable due to this bug. I'm so astounded that Riot hasn't acted on this yet, that this is my first post on the forums after lurking and being active for a year now!
how about her q applying her on hit effects to herself xD
